name: Valkyrie (itch) (Jakeop4444)
description:
The Valkyrie is a multiplayer tower defense game! One player takes control of the valkyrie, placing towers to ward off foes, while the other player(s) control ground units. The ground units have a limited number of lives, as well as have total control over the camera movement!

Controls: 

Keyboard: Arrow Keys + Space

Xbox Controller: Left and Right joystick
